body:
I think one of the problems with this button is that it's just using the _"wrong"_ css classes - one that's normally intended for forms. Maybe have a look at [the old bootstrap docs](https://bootstrapdocs.com/v3.3.5/docs/components/#btn-dropdowns-single) what markup they use in their examples.

I could imagine something like:
```ruby
button.dropdown-toggle.btn.btn-default data-toggle='dropdown'
```
to work with the right colors etc.

Do you wanna give it a try? Maybe better on the long run compared to overriding bootstrap defaults 🤔
